author: mouseywithpower

author: alesserbro
text:
I'm 29 and I make a point of grabbing one person on the spinny disc level, just at the top of the penultimate ramp every time I play. They always fall. 90% of the time they fail to qualify as a result.

There's something about the low stakes and cuteness of the game which makes grabbing so much fun.

Besides, if you look like you know what you're doing, why wouldn't I eliminate you? One less competent person to contend with on the final round.

Also frankly it's a silly game for silly people and if you don't find it funny when you get dicked over in the same way, you need to grow up ;) there's literally nothing at stake.

author: mouseywithpower
text: it was a joke bro it‚Äôs not that deep

author: alesserbro
text:
>it was a joke bro it‚Äôs not that deep

I know but I want to put some bait out there anyway. It's quite affirming to be the sole cause of someone's elimination.

author: SwimBrief
text:
This is what I‚Äôve started to realize - the entire objective of the game is to be the last guy standing.

I used to (and still kinda do, especially at cheese spots like the yellow rollers) absolutely hate these players, but if the goal is to eliminate everyone else why is it so bad if the players take some eliminations into their own hands? Every player they eliminate brings themselves one step closer to victory.

It is a battle royale after all and there is risk to actively eliminating other players as dear tomatoboy found out.

author: OffTheMerchandise
text: While it is true that the goal is to be the last one standing, there's a definite lack of sportsmanship with these people.

author: SwimBrief
text:
Most people see the objective as qualifying each level - they don‚Äôt see it as eliminate other players so you‚Äôre the last guy standing.

This is why those who shove people off slime mountain get so much hate, when from a purely strategic/ trying to win sense it makes sense as the less that qualify the better. Other maps where 40 will qualify no matter what you‚Äôre just being a dick haha
